item.title: Adding dbt to your Fivetran pipeline
item.description: Money ball - Sabermetrics, you too can analyze data… I wanted to write a blog to demonstrate the power of integrating dbt within Fivetran to load data into Snowflake. So, I thought about what data is freely available and decided that rather than one more analysis of pandemic data I’d prefer to focus on the upcoming baseball season. Fig 1: Our Pipeline Software Stack Assumptions for running this tutorial

item.title: Secure YAML Pipelines in Azure Dev Ops
item.description: Let’s talk about YAML pipelines in Azure DevOps. YAML pipelines are great! Using YAML pipelines in Azure DevOps allows deployment pipelines to be expressed as code. Expressing pipelines as code simplifies the use of version control to support build & release pipelines. It also allows DevOps professionals to create libraries of pipeline code that can be reused to accelerate new tasks. All of this is great, but it is also important to ensure that pipelines are secure.
